headline: Hobbled, but Yearning to Float Like a Butterfly
abstract: A work premiering at the Dutch National Ballet will animate the Mexican painter’s emotional world and artistic legacy.
lead_paragraph: AMSTERDAM — Frida Kahlo’s vibrant art, turbulent life and tragic death at age 47 are certainly operatic. But the Mexican surrealist painter, who was left disabled by polio and a bus accident, might seem an unlikely subject for a ballet.
